CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 6 To improve the PCE , the following idealistic conditions are required in conjugated polymers : 14 ( 1 ) a low bandgap with a wide absorption area , ( 2 ) a crystalline structure to produce good charge transport characteristics , ( 3 ) a low highest occupied molecular orbital ( HOMO ) energy level to produce a high open - circuit voltage ( V oc ) , and ( 4 ) an appropriate lowest unoccupied molecular orbital ( LUMO ) energy level for effective electron charge transfer to fullerene.

Let's think step by step.

1. "a low bandgap" - bandgap is a property of a material, specifically a solid material, that describes the range of energy in which the material cannot absorb or emit radiation.
2. "a crystalline structure" - crystalline structure is a type of material structure, referring to a solid material whose constituent parts are arranged in a highly ordered way.
3. "a low highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) energy level" - HOMO is a property of a material, specifically an organic semiconductor material, that describes the energy level of the highest occupied molecular orbital.
4. "an appropriate lowest unoccupied molecular orbital (LUMO) energy level" - LUMO is a property of a material, specifically an organic semiconductor material, that describes the energy level of the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital.
5. "fullerene" - Fullerene is a type of carbon allotrope, a material made entirely of carbon atoms.

Note: PCE stands for power conversion efficiency, which is a property of a material, specifically a material used in solar cells.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. "a low bandgap"
2. "a crystalline structure"
3. "a low highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) energy level"
4. "an appropriate lowest unoccupied molecular orbital (LUMO) energy level"
5. "fullerene"

Note: I have removed PCE as it is a property of a material and not a material name itself.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| a low bandgap |
| a crystalline structure |
| a low highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) energy level |
| an appropriate lowest unoccupied molecular orbital (LUMO) energy level |
| fullerene |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 6 To improve the PCE , the following idealistic conditions are required in conjugated polymers : 14 ( 1 ) a low bandgap with a wide absorption area , ( 2 ) a crystalline structure to produce good charge transport characteristics , ( 3 ) a low highest occupied molecular orbital ( HOMO ) energy level to produce a high open - circuit voltage ( V oc ) , and ( 4 ) an appropriate lowest unoccupied molecular orbital ( LUMO ) energy level for effective electron charge transfer to fullerene.

Let's think step by step.

1. "a low bandgap" - This is the first "Property Value" entity in the paragraph.
2. "a wide absorption area" - This is the second "Property Value" entity in the paragraph.
3. "a crystalline structure" - This is the third "Property Value" entity in the paragraph.
4. "good charge transport characteristics" - This is the fourth "Property Value" entity in the paragraph.
5. "a low highest occupied molecular orbital ( HOMO ) energy level" - This is the fifth "Property Value" entity in the paragraph.
6. "a high open - circuit voltage ( V oc )" - This is the sixth "Property Value" entity in the paragraph.
7. "an appropriate lowest unoccupied molecular orbital ( LUMO ) energy level" - This is the seventh "Property Value" entity in the paragraph.
8. "for effective electron charge transfer to fullerene" - This is the eighth "Property Value" entity in the paragraph.

The "Property Value" entities in this paragraph are the desired characteristics or qualities that are required for improving the PCE (power conversion efficiency) in conjugated polymers.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. "a low bandgap"
2. "a wide absorption area"
3. "a crystalline structure"
4. "good charge transport characteristics"
5. "a low highest occupied molecular orbital ( HOMO ) energy level"
6. "a high open - circuit voltage ( V oc )"
7. "an appropriate lowest unoccupied molecular orbital ( LUMO ) energy level"
